title: Tesla Placement Tournament!
body:
Hello there everyone, I am Kairutox, owner of the Truth Gaming organisation.

I have hosted two tournaments so far this year and I am looking at taking things to the next level!

I am planning on doing an amateur league with preferably 3 separate divisions. 

The first division setup will be decided in a placement tournament! We need AT LEAST 12 teams to make this happen, with a maximum of 24 for the three divisions.

Divisions will be 6-8 teams in each. This league will be a 12 week event, continuing into a gauntlet style finals series, very much like the OPL.

With this being an amateur league, there will be opportunity to be promoted/relegated in order to freshen up the different teams in each division. These games will be played at the end of each league.

Division 1, which will be the highest division, will be played on Friday nights, with Division 2 being Wednesday nights, and if we get enough teams for 3 divisions (which I really hope we do), Division 3 will be played Monday nights.

There will be 3-4 games each night, with each team only playing once a week. We do plan on streaming all these games over two streams.
In order to keep this as an amateur league, we will not accept full challenger teams.

We are currently opening up applications for the Tesla Placement Tournament.

Spread the word, get your friends and their teams involved!

Once joining on Battlefy, please join the Truth Gaming discord, and talk to a Leader in order to get your teams role made, and get given your role.

The discord link is https://discord.gg/4XPAhNt.

The Tesla Placement Tournament will be played on Friday the 25th May with a start time of 5:00pm ACST.

Enter here! https://battlefy.com/truth-gaming/tesla-placement-tournament/5ae828161fa8b303830d89ac/info

The placement tournament will have no prize, as the Tesla League will hopefully be receiving Riot prizes.
